alternateIdentifier._instruction: Enter all identifiers for this strain, excluding its ontological identifers or RRID (e.g., identifiers from the Mouse Genome Informatics (MGI) database or Rat Genome Database (RGD)).

backgroundStrain._instruction: Add the background strain that explains the majority of the genetic background and/or causes the majority of the prominent traits. If two strains contributed equally, state both.

breedingType._instruction: Add the breeding type for this strain.

description._instruction: Enter a short text describing this strain.

digitalIdentifier._instruction: Add the 'Research Resource Identifier' (RRID) of this strain.

diseaseModel._instruction: Add all (human) diseases and/or conditions that this strain is a model for.

geneticStrainType._instruction: Add the genetic background type of this strain.

laboratoryCode._instruction: Enter the laboratory code assigned by the Institute of Laboratory Animal Research (ILAR) for the investigator or organization that has created this strain following the defined pattern (e.g., Aaa).

name._instruction: Enter the name of this strain.

ontologyIdentifier._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifiers (IRIs) to the related ontological terms matching this strain.

phenotype._instruction: Enter a short description for the phenotype of this strain.

species._instruction: Add the species of this strain.

stockNumber._instruction: Add the stock number from the vendor the strain was supplied from/is in stock at.

synonym._instruction: Enter any synonyms (including abbreviations) of this strain.
